pageContext.title: Hello My Name is Vladimir
pageContext.tagline: Limonnik Infused Imperial IPA (Not for Gays).
pageContext.description: A Limonnik-infused, triple dry- hopped double IPA. Dry berry tartness and intense citrus hop character meld with a dry bready malt base, boosted by a hint of alcohol warmth. This beer was brewed as a protest against the anti-LGBT legislation in Russia surrounding the Sochi Olympics.
pageContext.author: Ali Skinner <AliSkinner>
